this is such a fun game concept and it totally healed me from decades of being wronged by reallife claw machines great value and cant wait to see how this game continues to develop i do hope to see some game statistics tracking like other roguelike games tend to have but for early access this game is extremely polished and addicting
i love this game
very addicting
she be clawin till i dungeon

i can fully recommend this early accress game it already has a lot of nice features and an addictive gameplay loop i would only like a few new enemies and more builds who could acutall work but overall for this low price it is a perfect game for the steam deck  note there are a ton of codes unlocking new outfits so check it out
a refreshing take on the roguelike genre it is equally frustrating fun and rewarding i really do hope that the developers continue to support this game

great game to play when you want to wind down and play something that doesnt require too much cognitive effort i play it at night to relax while watching star trek

i like the idea of a claw machine and rogue lite games can be challenging but this combination of mechanics just work great the fact there is a character that has a pet through the whole session with you made it so much better the unique characters really feel unique and how you approach a new session feels more interactive
fun little rogue lite  some builds are op but thats what makes it fun
tons of fun i keep going back to it and the devs keep adding content totally worth it

its another slay the spire with a cool twist instead of just getting cards into your hand from your deck your pulling them out of clawing machine reminds me a little of game called peglin but maybe thats just me

this is a great twist on the roguelike who doesnt love playing with a claw machine and there are soooo many different upgrades and perks that ive been playing for five hours and still see new ones every run very easy to pick up but requires some thought to figure out the best combos i can see myself playing this as much as i play slay the spire

while trying to find the next intersection of roguelike and every day occurence we come across and claw machine let me tell you this game is great they did and are continuing to do a very good job in balancing what you can grab with the claw what type of claw you can have and how it interacts with the different enemies you come across pair this with several minigames within the world and some tough bosses and you get a very dopaminedriving roguelike i cant recommend enough

looks simple at a glance but has a good amount of classesperksitems to facilitate respectable build synergies and play variety also has great player agency in build creation with item removal stations that seems very well balanced  if you enjoy roguelites dont overlook this one its definitely a gem

a very fun twist on the sts style of battle using a claw machine to fight easy to synergize items and win a run if youre familiar with the mechanics used in some other games theres not a lot of content on the item side of things but there a lot of characters to unlock and each have their own item you can unlock for winning a run with them  definitely worth the purchase

one of the premier physicsbased roguelike deckbuilders out there the concept works really well and has the right combination of luck and skill to be highly replayable theres already a ton of content and combinations to explore  my only complaint is that the end of runs feels lackluster especially with the narrative intro i was expecting a resolution to the story but i imagine thats planned for the full game and i very much look forward to seeing where it goes
